item.title: LAKE SHORE BANCORP INC 10-K
item.description: LAKE SHORE BANCORP INC, which is in the Savings Institution, Federally Chartered [6035] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 29 2021 had 42914 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 618 instances loan - 513 instances 31 - 447 instances 1 - 442 instances december - 436 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
